description: AI-powered matching platform connecting early-stage startups with investors. Features include startup-investor matching engine, voting system, portfolio management, admin dashboard, and AI-powered data enrichment.
key_features: Startup-Investor Matching Engine - AI-powered matching using GOD algorithm
Voting System - Anonymous voting on startups
Portfolio Management - Build and share investment portfolios
Investor Directory - Browse and search investors
Startup Directory - Browse and search startups
Admin Dashboard - Complete admin workflow management
RSS Feed Manager - News article discovery
GOD Score System - Startup quality scoring algorithm
Match Score Breakdown - Detailed match analysis
Pricing Plans - Spark, Flame, Inferno tiers

main_pages.name: Landing Page
main_pages.description: Main landing page with matching engine preview

main_pages.name: Matching Engine
main_pages.description: Core matching interface showing startup-investor pairs with scores

key_components.name: MatchingEngine
key_components.description: Main matching interface displaying startup-investor pairs with pre-calculated match scores

key_components.name: EnhancedStartupCard
key_components.description: Detailed startup card with GOD scores and PMF signals

key_components.name: EnhancedInvestorCard
key_components.description: Detailed investor card with portfolio and investment criteria

key_components.name: TrendingPage
key_components.description: Trending startups with multiple ranking algorithms
